name: City Constructions Simulator
description:
Becoem a boss of a building company in a new construction simulator and make it big! You have a lot of stuff to build - from a house to huge bridge. And multiple trucks to build with - from an excavator to tower crane. Run a full-scale building company and build objects yourself!

Features of City Building Company:

FULL-SCALED CONSTRUCTION
Build everything, from a small house to railway tunnels

VARIOUS CONTRATS
Complete different construction contracts to run your company

VAST MACHINES VARIETY
Buy construction machines to perform more works in construction simulator

ALL KINDS OF JOBS
Do every construction work that is done with machines

Build your business!
Turn your small building company big in the construction simulator - take some construction contracts, each finished building will allow to buy new truck and take new contracts. Try to build buildings and your business in the construction simulator.

Drive your trucks!
Construction simulator lets you operate specialized machinery. Building on a construction site if more exciting than sitting in the office - construction simulator is like a huge sandbox! Drive concrete pump, crane truck, pile driver and other cool construction machines yourself!

Chose your contracts!
A building company will always have a job in the big city of the construction simulator. But some building contracts require some special trucks. To run a successful construction company you must buy more construction trucks to complete more contracts.
